mapper.select: SELECT d.dept_name, COUNT(e.emp_id) emp_count FROM emp e RIGHT OUTER JOIN dept d ON e.emp_dept_id = d.dept_id GROUP BY d.dept_name
SELECT j.job_name "jobName", IFNULL(FLOOR(AVG(e.emp_salary)),0) "avgSal" FROM emp e RIGHT OUTER JOIN job j ON e.emp_job_id = j.job_id GROUP BY j.job_name
SELECT d.dept_name "deptName", IFNULL(MAX(e.emp_salary),0) "maxSal", IFNULL(MIN(e.emp_salary),0) "minSal" FROM emp e RIGHT OUTER JOIN dept d ON e.emp_dept_id = d.dept_id GROUP BY d.dept_name

SELECT m.*,m.`deptName`, m.`deptMaxSal` / 10 `deptMaxSalLevel`, m.`deptMinSal` / 10 `deptMinSalLevel` FROM (SELECT d.dept_name "deptName", IFNULL(FLOOR(AVG(e.emp_salary)),0) "deptAvgSal", IFNULL(MAX(e.emp_salary),0) "deptMaxSal", IFNULL(MIN(e.emp_salary),0) "deptMinSal", COUNT(e.emp_id) "deptEmpCount" FROM dept d LEFT OUTER JOIN emp e ON d.dept_id = e.emp_dept_id GROUP BY d.dept_name) m
